0: Ayo, rippin' y'all niggas is the easiest
1: Y'all style is the nacho cheesiest
2: Everybody wanna shine, they the greediest
3: When they know they bank account is the measliest
4: You gotta know when to hold 'em
6: Know when to run when my niggas be rollin'
7: Holdin' your gun, especially if you owe 'em
8: Watchin' yo back, especially in the mornin'
9: Now niggas give you a pound and tell you, "Be safe."
10: Like you carryin' a million dollars in a briefcase
11: Now you're all paranoid like, "Is this shit laced?"
12: My niggas come in all black like deep space
15: Any more want they girl to play Demi Moore?
title: Fight With The Best
